00022 /**

00024  * @author Mybrid Spalding
00025  * @date   Tue Jul 22 08:33:25 PDT 2008
00026  * @brief  Class to supplant Genotype data (CHP) with user supplied data.
00027  */

00029 //
00030 #include "translation/GenotypeOverrideTableModel.h"

00046 
00047 const TittmColumnDefinition GOTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[] = { // column_name, empty_ok, index, valid_regex
00048   { std::string("CHP Filename"),      0, 0, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00049   { std::string("Gene"),              0, 1,
00050     std::string("^[A-Z\\d]+$"), NULL},
00051   { std::string("Common Name"),       0, 2, std::string(".*"), NULL  },
00052   { std::string("Probe Set ID"),      0, 3,
00053     std::string("^(?:[\\w\\d]+)$"), NULL },
00054   { std::string("Basecall"),          1, 4,
00055     std::string("^(?:0|ZeroCopyNumber|PossibleRareAllele|NoCall|NotAvailable|PRA|NC|-)|(?:(?:[ACGT0]+|INS|Ins|DEL|Del|-)/(?:[ACGT]+|INS|Ins|DEL|Del|-))$"), NULL },
00056   { std::string("Override Comment"),  1, 5, std::string(".*"), NULL },
00057   { std::string("Reference Allele"),  0, 6,
00058     std::string("^(?:[ACGT0]+)|(?:INS)|(?:DEL)|(?:-)$"), NULL },
00059   { std::string("Variant Allele"),    0, 7,
00060     std::string("^(?:[ACGT]+|INS|Ins|DEL|Del|-)(?:[,](?:[ACGT]+|INS|Ins|DEL|Del|-))*$"), NULL },
00061 };

00064 /**
00065  * filterRowCallback:
00066  * Synopsis:
00067  *
00068  *  A callback function passed to TranslationInputTsvTableModel.
00069  *
00070  *  DEPRECATED: As of 10/08/2008 filtering is deprecated. If someone
00071  *  wants to override a specific call with a NoCall they can now do so.
00072  *  This function filters out NoCall values such that they would never
00073  *  be used from the override file.
00074  *
00075  *
00076  *
00077  * @param name1 - description
00078  * @param name1 - description
00079  * @return - description
00080  */
00081 /*****************************************************************************/
00082 /*
00083 static bool filterRowCallback(std::vector< std::string > & row)
00084 {
00085 
00086   pcrecpp::RE filter("No[cC]all|PossibleRareAllele|NC|PRA");
00087 
00088   APT_ERR_ASSERT(row.size() == GenotypeOverrideTableModel::END_GOTM_FIELD_INDEX, "");
00089 
00090   if (row[GenotypeOverrideTableModel::BASECALL_INDEX].empty() ||
00091       filter.PartialMatch(row[GenotypeOverrideTableModel::BASECALL_INDEX])) {
00092     return true;
00093   }
00094 
00095 
00096   return false;
00097 
00098 }
00099 */

00101 /*****************************************************************************/
00102 /*****************************************************************************/
00103 /**
00104  * GenotypeOverrideTableModel::GenotypeOverrideTableModel
00105  * Synopsis:
00106  *
00107  * This is the TransferObject to the TsvFile DataAccessObject design
00108  * pattern. There is only ever one of these in existence, i.e. this
00109  * is a single instance class.
00110  *
00111  * genotype override file -> genotype override table model
00112  *
00113  * Default TSV constructor for the GenotypeOverrideTableModel.
00114  *
00115  * This constructor is beefy for one reason: to validate
00116  * rows and then to swap the row information with error messaging
00117  * in the event that the row is invalid.
00118  *
00119  * Unlike most other input files for the translation algorithm,
00120  * the override file is permitted to have bad data and translation
00121  * still runs. When bad rows are detected, an error message is stuffed
00122  * into the override comment field and the override row is otherwise
00123  * ignored.
00124  *
00125  * Validation occurs per allele or probe set with the exception of
00126  * Zero Copy Number. With Zero Copy Number all probe sets for a gene
00127  * must be present or the override is rejected.
00128  * 
00129  * @param rte - RunTimeEnvironment which contains options
00130  * @param genoOverrideFileName - the input file to read in.
00131  * @param ttm - The translation table instance used for validation.
00132  */
00133 /*****************************************************************************/
00134 GenotypeOverrideTableModel::GenotypeOverrideTableModel(const class RunTimeEnvironment &rte,  const std::string &genoOverrideFileName, class TranslationTableModel & ttm) :
00135     TranslationInputTsvTableModel(rte, genoOverrideFileName, GOTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS, (sizeof(GOTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS) / sizeof(GOTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[0])), true, NULL, NULL, false)
00136 {
00137 
00138   std::vector< std::string > alleles;
00139   std::set< std::string >  copyNumberZeroGenes;
00140   std::map< std::string, std::set< std::string > > geneMarkers;
00141   std::stringstream        invalidSStr;
00142   pcrecpp::RE              zeroCopyRE("ZeroCopyNumber|0");
00143   pcrecpp::RE              zeroCopyValidSetRE("ZeroCopyNumber|0|NotAvailable");
00144   
00145   for (size_t row = 0; row < m_rows.size(); row++) {
00146 
00147     // VALIDATION
00148     // We requested that validation not be done by the constructor so
00149     // that special action can be taken here with respect to validation.
00150     // Specifically, invalid rows are appended to a reporting structure
00151     // and does not cause the translation to stop.
00152 
00153     bool okRow         = true;
00154     bool okRowProbeSet = true;
00155     std::string probeSet    = m_rows[row][PROBE_SET_INDEX];
00156     std::string gene        = m_rows[row][GENE_INDEX];
00157     std::string chpFile     = m_rows[row][CHP_FILE_INDEX] ;
00158     std::string key         = chpFile + "::" + probeSet;
00159     std::string geneKey     = chpFile + "::" + gene;
00160     alleles.clear();
00161     
00162     invalidSStr.str("");
00163       
00164     invalidSStr << "Invalid basecall override ignored";
00165 
00166     if ( (geneMarkers.count( geneKey )  == 0 ) || ( !geneMarkers[geneKey].count(probeSet)) )  {
00167       geneMarkers[geneKey].insert(probeSet);
00168     }
00169     else {
00170       okRow = false;
00171       invalidSStr << " | " << chpFile << " " << gene << " " << " duplicate  probe set " << probeSet << " detected." <<  endl;
00172     }
00173 
00174     for (int col = 0; (col < columnCount()) && okRow; col++) {
00175 
00176       std::string columnValue = m_rows[row][col];
00177         
00178       if (! GOTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[col].m_validRE.FullMatch(columnValue)) {
00179         okRow = false;
00180 
00181         invalidSStr << " | Unrecognized " << GOTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[col].m_columnName << " (" << columnValue << ") " ;
00182 
00183         if (col == PROBE_SET_INDEX) {
00184           okRowProbeSet = false;
00185         }
00186 
00187       } // if column is valid
00188 
00189     } // for each column
00190 
00191 
00192     // BASECALL VALIDATION
00193     // Make sure the base call is comprised of values found in the
00194     // reference and variant columns.
00195 
00196     if (okRow) {
00197 
00198       alleles = getOverrideAlleles(m_rows[row][CHP_FILE_INDEX], m_rows[row][PROBE_SET_INDEX], row);
00199 
00200       if ((alleles.size() != 2) && !zeroCopyValidSetRE.FullMatch(alleles[0] ) ) {
00201         okRow = false;
00202         invalidSStr << " | basecall format must be a copy number two designation  allele/allele " << m_rows[row][BASECALL_INDEX];
00203       }
00204  
00205       for (size_t i = 0; okRow && (i < alleles.size()); i++) {
00206 
00207         if (!CallElement::isWildCardBase(alleles[i]) &&
00208             !zeroCopyRE.FullMatch(alleles[i]) &&
00209             !(alleles[i] == m_rows[row][REFERENCE_INDEX]) &&
00210             !(pcrecpp::RE(alleles[i]).PartialMatch("((?:^)|(?:,))" + m_rows[row][VARIANT_INDEX] + "(?:(?:,)|(?:$))"))) {
00211           okRow = false;
00212           invalidSStr << " | basecall " << m_rows[row][BASECALL_INDEX] << " has alleles not found in either the reference {" << m_rows[row][REFERENCE_INDEX] <<  "} or variant list {" <<  m_rows[row][VARIANT_INDEX] << "} ";
00213         }
00214       }
00215     }
00216 
00217 
00218     // TRANSLATION TABLE VALIDATION
00219     if (okRow) {
00220       bool geneValid     = false;
00221       bool variantValid  = false;
00222       bool referenceValid = false;
00223       std::string rowGene;
00224       std::string rowReference;
00225       std::string rowVariants;
00226 
00227       if (ttm.m_probeSetRowIndex.count(probeSet) == 0) {
00228         okRow = false;
00229         okRowProbeSet = false;
00230         invalidSStr << " | "  << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << " does not contain probe set(" << probeSet << ") ";
00231       } else {
00232         for (size_t i = 0 ; i < ttm.m_probeSetRowIndex[probeSet].size(); i++) {
00233 
00234           int ttRow = ttm.m_probeSetRowIndex[probeSet][i];
00235           if (m_rows[row][GENE_INDEX] == ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENE)]) {
00236             geneValid = true;
00237           }
00238           rowGene = ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENE)];
00239           if (m_rows[row][REFERENCE_INDEX] == ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)]) {
00240             referenceValid = true;
00241           }
00242           rowReference = ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_REFERENCE)];
00243           if (pcrecpp::RE(ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)]).PartialMatch("((?:^)|(?:,))" + m_rows[row][VARIANT_INDEX] + "(?:(?:,)|(?:$))")) {
00244             variantValid = true;
00245           }
00246           if (rowVariants.empty()) {
00247             rowVariants = ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)];
00248           } else {
00249             rowVariants = rowVariants + "," + ttm.m_rows[ttRow][ttm.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_VARIANT)];
00250           }
00251         } // for each allele of a possible multiallelic probe set.
00252 
00253         if (!geneValid) {
00254           okRow = false;
00255           invalidSStr << " | "  << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << " probe set " << probeSet << " gene " << rowGene << " does not match (" << m_rows[row][GENE_INDEX] << ") ";
00256 
00257         }
00258         if (!referenceValid) {
00259           okRow = false;
00260           invalidSStr << " | "  << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << " probe set " << probeSet << " reference " << rowReference << " does not match (" << m_rows[row][REFERENCE_INDEX] << ") ";
00261 
00262         }
00263         if (!variantValid) {
00264           okRow = false;
00265           invalidSStr << " | "  << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << " probe set " << probeSet << " variant set {" << rowVariants << "} does not contain (" << m_rows[row][REFERENCE_INDEX] << ") ";
00266 
00267         }
00268 
00269         if ( okRow && alleles.size() && zeroCopyRE.FullMatch( alleles[0] ) &&
00270              !(ttm.getCopyNumberColumn(ttm.m_probeSetRowIndex[probeSet][0]) > 0) ) {
00271             okRow = false;
00272             invalidSStr << " | "  << Fs::basename(chpFile)
00273                         << " gene probe set " << gene << ", " << probeSet 
00274                         << " given ZeroCopyNumber override but has no such copy number zero designation in the translation table.";
00275         }
00276       }
00277     }
00278 
00279     if (okRow) {
00280       m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex[ key ] = row;
00281       if ( zeroCopyRE.FullMatch( alleles[0] ) && !copyNumberZeroGenes.count(geneKey) ) {
00282         copyNumberZeroGenes.insert(geneKey);
00283       }
00284     } else {
00285       if (okRowProbeSet) {
00286 
00287         m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment[key].push_back(m_rows[row][BASECALL_INDEX]);
00288         m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment[key].push_back(invalidSStr.str());
00289         
00290       }
00291 
00292       invalidSStr << " ROW {" << getRowAsString(row) << "}";
00293 
00294       Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, invalidSStr.str());
00295     }
00296 
00297   } // for each row
00298 
00299   if ( copyNumberZeroGenes.size() == 0 ) {
00300     return;
00301   }
00302 
00303   // ZERO COPY NUMBER VALIDATION
00304   
00305   // Validate that all copy number zero genes have the same set of markers
00306   // as the translation table.
00307   // Note there is an important order of occurence here.
00308   // The marker list which filters the translation table needs to be applied
00309   // to the translation table before this constructor is called.
00310   // The m_probeSetIndex is maintained to only have the filtered probe sets
00311   // and not the complete set of probe sets. The translation table contains
00312   // all probe sets where the filtered probe sets have been ignored or
00313   // commented out.
00314 
00315   std::map< std::string, std::string > validCopyNumberZeroCheck;
00316   bool invalidCopyNumberZeroGenesExist = false;
00317 
00318   for (size_t row = 0; row < m_rows.size(); row++) {
00319 
00320     std::string probeSet    = m_rows[row][PROBE_SET_INDEX];
00321     std::string gene        = m_rows[row][GENE_INDEX];
00322     std::string chpFile     = m_rows[row][CHP_FILE_INDEX] ;
00323     std::string key         = chpFile + "::" + probeSet;
00324     std::string geneKey     = chpFile + "::" + gene;
00325 
00326     if ( ! copyNumberZeroGenes.count(geneKey) || ! m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.count( key ) || validCopyNumberZeroCheck.count(geneKey) ) {
00327       continue;
00328     }
00329 
00330     alleles = getOverrideAlleles(m_rows[row][CHP_FILE_INDEX], m_rows[row][PROBE_SET_INDEX], row);
00331 
00332     if ( !zeroCopyValidSetRE.FullMatch(alleles[0]) ) {
00333         invalidSStr.str("");
00334         invalidSStr << "Invalid basecall override ignored | ";
00335         invalidSStr << Fs::basename(chpFile) << " gene " << gene << " probe set " << probeSet << " is not ZeroCopyNumber, but " << m_rows[row][BASECALL_INDEX] << ". ZeroCopyNumber override requires all probe sets to be present and ZeroCopyNumber basecall." ;
00336         validCopyNumberZeroCheck[geneKey] = invalidSStr.str();
00337         invalidCopyNumberZeroGenesExist = true;
00338         break;
00339 
00340     }
00341 
00342     if ( geneMarkers[geneKey].size() < ttm.m_geneMarkers[gene].size() ) {
00343       invalidSStr.str("");
00344       invalidSStr << "Invalid basecall override ignored | ";
00345       invalidSStr << " Gene " << gene << " ZeroCopyNumber requires " << ttm.m_geneMarkers[gene].size() << " probe set markers but only " << geneMarkers[geneKey].size() << " probe set markers were provided.";
00346       validCopyNumberZeroCheck[geneKey] = invalidSStr.str();
00347       invalidCopyNumberZeroGenesExist = true;
00348       continue;
00349     }      
00350 
00351     
00352     if ( ! validCopyNumberZeroCheck.count(geneKey) ) {
00353       for (size_t i = 0; i < ttm.m_geneMarkers[gene].size(); i++ ) {
00354         if ( ! geneMarkers[geneKey].count( ttm.m_geneMarkers[gene][i] ) ) {
00355           invalidSStr.str("");
00356           invalidSStr << "Invalid basecall override ignored | ";
00357           invalidSStr << Fs::basename(chpFile) << " gene " << gene << " ZeroCopyNumber markers provided differ from the translation table where " << ttm.m_geneMarkers[gene][i] << " was not found.";
00358           validCopyNumberZeroCheck[geneKey] = invalidSStr.str();
00359           invalidCopyNumberZeroGenesExist = true;
00360         }
00361       }
00362     }
00363 
00364   }
00365 
00366   // Remove the overrides from the valid list and set up the invalid
00367   // message.
00368   
00369   if ( invalidCopyNumberZeroGenesExist ) {
00370 
00371     for (size_t row = 0; row < m_rows.size(); row++) {
00372 
00373       std::string probeSet    = m_rows[row][PROBE_SET_INDEX];
00374       std::string gene        = m_rows[row][GENE_INDEX];
00375       std::string chpFile     = m_rows[row][CHP_FILE_INDEX] ;
00376       std::string key         = chpFile + "::" + probeSet;
00377       std::string geneKey     = chpFile + "::" + gene;
00378 
00379       if ( validCopyNumberZeroCheck.count(geneKey) &&
00380            (validCopyNumberZeroCheck[geneKey] != std::string("VALID")) ) {
00381 
00382         if ( m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.count(key)) {
00383           m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.erase( key );
00384           m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment[key].push_back(m_rows[row][BASECALL_INDEX]);
00385           m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment[key].push_back(validCopyNumberZeroCheck[geneKey]);
00386         }
00387       }
00388     }
00389 
00390   }
00391 
00392   return;
00393 
00394 }
00395 // end GenotypeOverrideTableModel::GenotypeOverrideTableModel

00398 /**
00399  * GenotypeOverrideTableModel::describeVerbose:
00400  * Synopsis:
00401  *
00402  * Run time debug routine that can be invoked with various verbose levels.
00403  * ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES is the default level.
00404  *
00405  * @param rte       - run time environment
00406  * @param override  - ADT_VERBOSE_INPUT_FILES by default,
00407  *                    otherwise the ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM level to output
00408  *
00409  */
00410 
00411 /*****************************************************************************/
00412 void GenotypeOverrideTableModel::describeVerbose(ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM level)
00413 {
00414 
00415   std::stringstream msgSStr;
00416 
00417   msgSStr << "GenotypeOverrideTableModel::describeVerbose" << endl;
00418 
00419   msgSStr << "m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex:" << endl;
00420 
00421   std::map< std::string, int >::iterator itSI = m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.begin();
00422 
00423   for (; itSI != m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.end(); itSI++) {
00424 
00425     msgSStr << itSI->first << " row [" << itSI->second << "]" << endl;
00426 
00427   }
00428 
00429   std::map< std::string, std::string >::iterator itSS = m_chpFileProbeSetOriginalBasecall.begin();
00430 
00431   msgSStr << "m_chpFileProbeSetOriginalBasecall:" << endl;
00432   for (; itSS != m_chpFileProbeSetOriginalBasecall.end(); itSS++) {
00433 
00434     msgSStr << itSS->first << " : " << itSS->second << endl;
00435 
00436   }
00437 
00438 
00439   msgSStr << "m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment:" << endl;
00440 
00441   std::map< std::string,  std::vector< std::string > >::iterator itSVS
00442   = m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment.begin();
00443 
00444   for (; itSVS != m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment.end(); itSVS++) {
00445 
00446     msgSStr << itSVS->first << " : ";
00447     for (size_t i = 0; i < itSVS->second.size(); i++) {
00448       msgSStr << itSVS->second[i] << ", ";
00449     }
00450 
00451     msgSStr << endl;
00452   }
00453 
00454   Verbose::out(level, msgSStr.str());
00455 
00456 }
00457 // end GenotypeOverrideTableModel::describeVerbose
00458 /*****************************************************************************/
00459 /*****************************************************************************/
00460 /**
00461  * GenotypeOverrideTableModel::getOverrideAlleles:
00462  * Synopsis:
00463  *
00464  *    If an override exists, returns a non-empty std::vector pair of std::strings
00465  * corresponding to the override basecall alleles.
00466  *
00467  * NOTE: Override files only have "NoCall", "PossibleRareAllele" or "
00468  * "NotAvailable" and not the format of "NoCall/NoCall" as
00469  * would be returned by the GenoCallCoder. Therefore the return result
00470  * for wildcard overrides are reformated to the GenoCallCoder format
00471  * ("NoCall/NoCall").
00472  *
00473  *
00474  *
00475  * @param chpFileName - experiment chp file name (minus .CHP)
00476  * @param probeSetId  - probeset id in question.
00477  * @param row         - the row in "m_rows".
00478  *
00479  * @return - alleles as a std::string pair inside a std::vector.
00480  */
00481 /*****************************************************************************/
00482 std::vector< std::string > GenotypeOverrideTableModel::getOverrideAlleles(const std::string & chpFileName, const std::string & probeSetId, int row)
00483 {
00484 
00485   std::vector< std::string > results;
00486 
00487   if (chpFileName.empty() || probeSetId.empty()) {
00488     return results;
00489   }
00490   bool printResults = false;
00491   
00492   if (row < 0) {
00493 
00494     printResults = true;
00495     std::string key = chpFileName + "::" + probeSetId;
00496 
00497     std::map< std::string , int >::const_iterator itSI;
00498     itSI = m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.find(key) ;
00499 
00500     if (itSI == m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.end()) {
00501       return results;
00502     }
00503     row = itSI->second;
00504   }
00505 
00506   std::string basecall = m_rows[row][BASECALL_INDEX];
00507 
00508   pcrecpp::RE split("([^/]+)/([^/]+)");
00509 
00510   std::string allele1;
00511   std::string allele2;
00512 
00513   if (split.FullMatch(basecall, &allele1, &allele2)) {
00514     results.push_back(allele1);
00515     results.push_back(allele2);
00516   }
00517   
00518   if (pcrecpp::RE("0|ZeroCopyNumber|PossibleRareAllele|NoCall|NotAvailable|NC|PCRA|NA").FullMatch(basecall)) {
00519     if ( basecall  == "ZeroCopyNumber" ) {
00520       basecall = "0";
00521     }
00522     results.push_back(basecall);
00523     if ( basecall != "0" ) {
00524       results.push_back(basecall);
00525     }
00526   }
00527 
00528 
00529   return results;
00530 
00531 }
00532 // end GenotypeOverrideTableModel::getOverrideAlleles
00533 /*****************************************************************************/
00534 /*****************************************************************************/
00535 /**
00536  * GenotypeOverrideTableModel::getOverrideInfo:
00537  * Synopsis:
00538  *
00539  *    If an override exists, returns a non-empty std::vector PAIR of std::strings
00540  * corresponding to the override basecall original basecall and the
00541  * override comment (override basecall, override comment).
00542  *
00543  *
00544  *
00545  * @param chpFileName - experiment chp file name (minus .CHP)
00546  * @param probeSetId  - assay id in question.
00547  * @param includeInvalidOriginalBaseCall - boolean that returns that includes the original base call, even for invalid calls. 
00548  *
00549  * @return - (original basecall, commment) as a std::vector pair of std::strings.
00550  */
00551 /*****************************************************************************/
00552 std::vector< std::string > GenotypeOverrideTableModel::getOverrideInfo(const std::string & chpFileName, const std::string & probeSetId, bool includeInvalidOriginalBaseCall )
00553 {
00554 
00555   std::vector< std::string > results;
00556 
00557   if (chpFileName.empty() || probeSetId.empty()) {
00558     return results;
00559   }
00560 
00561   std::string key = chpFileName + "::" + probeSetId;
00562 
00563   std::map< std::string , int >::const_iterator itSI;
00564 
00565   itSI = m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.find(key) ;
00566 
00567 
00568   if (itSI == m_chpFileProbeSetToRowIndex.end()) {
00569 
00570     // INVALID uncalled file row check.
00571     std::map< std::string , std::vector< std::string >  >::const_iterator jtSVS;
00572     jtSVS =  m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment.find(key);
00573 
00574     if (jtSVS == m_chpFileProbeSetInvalidBasecallComment.end()) {
00575       // COMMON CASE, most probe set rows will not be in the uncalled file.
00576       return results;
00577     }
00578 
00579     // ROW was INVALID
00580     APT_ERR_ASSERT(jtSVS->second.size() == 2, "");
00581 
00582     if ( includeInvalidOriginalBaseCall ) {
00583       results.push_back(jtSVS->second[0]);
00584     }
00585     else {
00586       results.push_back("");
00587     }
00588 
00589     results.push_back(jtSVS->second[1]);
00590 
00591     return results;
00592   }
00593 
00594   std::string comment = m_rows[itSI->second][OVERRIDE_COMMENT_INDEX];
00595 
00596   std::map< std::string, std::string >::const_iterator itSS;
00597 
00598   itSS = m_chpFileProbeSetOriginalBasecall.find(key);
00599 
00600   if (itSS == m_chpFileProbeSetOriginalBasecall.end()) {
00601     return results;
00602   }
00603 
00604   std::string basecall = itSS->second;
00605 
00606   results.push_back(basecall);
00607   results.push_back(comment);
00608 
00609   return results;
00610 
00611 }
00612 // end GenotypeOverrideTableModel::getOverrideInfo
